name: Tomb Dwarf

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

languages: the languages it knew in life

trait.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: While in sunlight, the tomb dwarf has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tomb dwarf makes two longsword attacks or two crossbow attacks. It can use its Life Drain in place of one longsword attack.

action.name: Life Drain
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) necrotic damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or its hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the damage taken. This reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if this effect reduces its hit point maximum to 0.A humanoid slain by this attack rises 24 hours later as a zombie under the tomb dwarf's control, unless the humanoid is restored to life or its body is destroyed. The tomb dwarf can have no more than twelve zombies under its control at one time.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage, or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.
